text:
This is a transfer of a bug originally assigned to konqueror 
<http://bugs.kde.org/show_bug.cgi?id=72323>. I've tracked the bug down to 
conf/mime.types in both Apache 1.3 and Apache 2.0. 
 
Basically these the three lines: 
audio/x-pn-realaudio		ram rm 
audio/x-pn-realaudio-plugin	rpm 
audio/x-realaudio		ra 
 
Should be replaced by: 
audio/x-pn-realaudio		ram ra 
audio/x-pn-realaudio-plugin	rpm 
application/vnd.rn-realmedia    rm 
 
Also completly unrelated I would suggest identifying rpms with 
application/x-rpm, as in the linux package format, as it much more widely used 
than plugins for realplayer.
creator: kde@carewolf.com

text:
Fixed in 2.1 and proposed for backport into the stable branches. (removed rpm
completely).

Thanks for the report and thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
